content.description: Predicting the possible outcomes of program (2017 Spring, Final, Question 8)

p.line: _BOLDS_reverse_BOLDE_ reverses the order of the digits, and _BOLDS_right_BOLDE_ rotates the digits to the right (the one furthest on the right moves over to the left). How many different, unique values of NUMBER are there at the end? (select all that apply) Note: _EMPHS__BOLDS_"set"_BOLDE__EMPHE_ blocks run instantaneously and "atomically" (i.e., aren't interrupted by any other script)

content.hint: Greedy soluction always takes the one with the highest score ( = value / weight), while optimal solution consider other possibilities as well.
